title: What is truth? My answer is more Jordan  Peterson than Sam Harris
description:
Video Lexicographer wanted me to answer this question. His timing was good since it was in sync with all the processing I've been doing anticipating their conversations. I've integrated a lot of my thoughts about layered reality. CS Lewis will get into the conversation as well as Scott Alexander. 

Video Lexicographer Video https://youtu.be/L_aOlxaNk4Q
http://slatestarcodex.com/2017/06/21/against-murderism/ 
JRE https://youtu.be/xDsoWp743gM

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
